item.title: Simple Daily Journal Prompt
item.description: Over the past few years, I’ve developed a daily writing habit in my note-taking apps (I’m currently using Notion, having migrated from Evernote a few months ago). At first, I just write my daily feeling, what negative or positive emotions I currently feel, and the source of them. It helps me meditate on my life. Sometimes I even come up with a good quote or self-advice. But writing about feeling alone might be boring sometimes, so I started to look for something different.
